skills.name: Mana Bubble
skills.description: Bursts a mana bubble that deals damage to an enemy and removes a beneficial effect with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill increases according to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.5*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Air Shield
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on an ally target and casts a shield which is equivalent to 20% of your MAX HP for 3 turns.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Crushed Hopes
skills.description: Attacks the enemy target 3 times to remove the beneficial effect with the 1st attack. Decreases the Defense for 2 turns, and increases the skill cooldown by 2 turns with a 50% chance with each attack.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Increase Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)
